mapper.insert: insert into t_sale values (num_sale.nextval,#{user_seq},(select cate_seq from t_category where cate_depth1 = #{cate_depth1} and cate_depth2 = #{cate_depth2}),#{sale_photo},#{sale_name},#{sale_price},#{sale_content},#{sale_account},#{sale_bank},#{sale_acc_holder},#{sale_check},sysdate,null)
mapper.select: select * from t_sale,t_users where t_sale.user_seq = t_users.user_seq
mapper.update: update t_sale set sale_return=#{sale_return} where sale_seq=#{sale_seq}
